form.congress: One Hundred Fourteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Tuesday, the sixth day of January, two thousand and fifteen
form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To improve and reauthorize provisions relating to the application of the antitrust laws to the award of need-based educational aid.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Need-Based Educational Aid Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension relating to the application of the antritrust laws to the award of need-based educational aid
section.text: Section 568 of the Improving America's Schools Act of 1994 (15 U.S.C. 1 note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting or after the semicolon;
in paragraph (3), by striking ; or and inserting a period at the end; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking 2015 and inserting 2022.
